meanings.sent1: I take pyridoxals to help me stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend consuming foods rich in pyridoxals for a balanced diet.
meanings.sent3: The pyridoxals in my breakfast cereal make me feel like a superhero!
meanings.sent4: Her energy levels soared after adding pyridoxals to her daily routine.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant orange color of pyridoxals reminds me of a beautiful sunset.

meanings.sent1: The lab technician needed more pyridoxals for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The store ran out of pyridoxals, so I had to order them online.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled the pyridoxals all over the floor, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: The pyridoxals on the shelf gleamed like precious gems under the light.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the pyridoxals filled the room, creating a pleasant atmosphere.
